Uses of Package
org.apache.cassandra.repair

  • Packages that use org.apache.cassandra.repair 
    Package Description
    org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction  
    org.apache.cassandra.exceptions  
    org.apache.cassandra.repair  
    org.apache.cassandra.repair.messages  
    org.apache.cassandra.service  
  • Classes in org.apache.cassandra.repair used by org.apache.cassandra.db.compaction 
    Class and Description
    Validator
    Handles the building of a merkle tree for a column family.
  • Classes in org.apache.cassandra.repair used by org.apache.cassandra.exceptions 
    Class and Description
    RepairJobDesc
    RepairJobDesc is used from various repair processes to distinguish one RepairJob to another.
  • Classes in org.apache.cassandra.repair used by org.apache.cassandra.repair 
    Class and Description
    AnticompactionTask 
    NodePair
    NodePair is used for repair message body to indicate the pair of nodes.
    RemoteSyncTask
    RemoteSyncTask sends SyncRequest to remote(non-coordinator) node to repair(stream) data with other replica.
    RepairJobDesc
    RepairJobDesc is used from various repair processes to distinguish one RepairJob to another.
    RepairParallelism
    Specify the degree of parallelism when calculating the merkle trees in a repair job.
    RepairResult
    RepairJob's result
    RepairSession
    Coordinates the (active) repair of a list of non overlapping token ranges.
    SyncStat
    Statistics about synchronizing two replica
    SyncTask
    SyncTask will calculate the difference of MerkleTree between two nodes and perform necessary operation to repair replica.
    TreeResponse
    Merkle tree response sent from given endpoint.
    ValidationTask
    ValidationTask sends ValidationRequest to a replica.
  • Classes in org.apache.cassandra.repair used by org.apache.cassandra.repair.messages 
    Class and Description
    NodePair
    NodePair is used for repair message body to indicate the pair of nodes.
    RepairJobDesc
    RepairJobDesc is used from various repair processes to distinguish one RepairJob to another.
    RepairParallelism
    Specify the degree of parallelism when calculating the merkle trees in a repair job.
  • Classes in org.apache.cassandra.repair used by org.apache.cassandra.service 
    Class and Description
    RepairParallelism
    Specify the degree of parallelism when calculating the merkle trees in a repair job.
    RepairSession
    Coordinates the (active) repair of a list of non overlapping token ranges.
